string-array.name: place_desc
string-array.item: Antonie is a model who lives in Florence.
Im a programmer who lives in Tokyo.
Scott is a an American actor and model.
Im just a poor schumck who got my pic copied.
I sing songs on my guitar.
A former Special Forces operative who now works as a mercenary.
